faqs.question: What if the property differs from the photos?
faqs.answer: Our on-ground quality team inspects properties every 48 hours. If a stay doesn‚Äôt match listing standards, we relocate you to an equivalent or better property at no extra cost.

faqs.question: Can I modify or cancel after booking?
faqs.answer: Yes. Most stays allow free modifications up to 24 hours before check-in. Use the booking manager or contact support to make changes instantly.

faqs.question: How do payments and refunds work?
faqs.answer: Pay online or at the hotel. Refunds are processed within 5-7 working days to the original payment method once verified by the property.

faqs.question: Do you offer GST invoices?
faqs.answer: All corporate-compatible properties provide GST invoices. Add GST details while booking or share them with our support team before checkout.
